amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Access College Early Scholarship Program established; purpose.
amendatorysection.para: The Access College Early Scholarship Program is established. The purpose of the program is to provide financial assistance to low-income students for courses to be taken for credit from a qualified postsecondary educational institution while still enrolled in high school. The program shall be administered by the commission.
